items.title: Anker SOLIX flash sale drops C2000 Gen 2 power station bundle with alternator charger to $1,148, more from $929
items.summary:
As part of Anker’s extended SOLIX Winter Sale, the popular backup power brand is now offering a collection of 72-hour flash offers that are getting up to $5,198 savings, one of which being the handy bundle of the new C2000 Gen 2 Portable Power Station with an alternator charger for $1,148 shipped, beating its Amazon pricing by $50. While it goes for $2,098 at full price directly from the Anker website, we’ve been seeing this bundle keep down between $1,249 and $1,199 recently, with it having gone as low as $1,049 before. If you missed out on that low price during Christmas/New Year sales, you’re getting it at the next-best rate here, as $151 is cut from the recent going rate (and $950 off the MSRP). You can also pick up Anker’s SOLIX C2000 Gen 2 power station by itself at $799 shipped (and matching at Amazon) if you don’t want the charge-as-you-drive functionality of the bundle, which we also recently went hands-on with in our latest review. Head below to learn more and browse the full lineup of 72-hour flash deals.

items.title: Razer’s pro-grade Wolverine V3 controllers with Hall effect sticks now start from $44 all-time low
items.summary:
As part of its wider sale on gaming accessories, Woot is offering Razer’s Wolverine V3 Tournament Edition wired controller for $43.99 Prime shipped (a $6 delivery fee will apply otherwise). Be sure to enter promo code GAMER during checkout. This particular gamepad typically goes for $100 at Amazon, so you’re looking at a $56 discount on it right now. It’s available in black and white colors, and they’re both down to the $44 low today. We previously saw this gamepad in white drop to $58 as part of one of Woot’s previous video game sales, but today’s discounted price – when paired with the promo code – shaves an additional $14 off to mark a new best price to beat. Woot is also offering the wireless V3 Pro model in white for $119.99 shipped when you enter the same promo code, which is also the lowest price we have tracked for it to date. Head below for more details.

Normally going for $1,499 and $1,799 at full price, you’ll more likely be able to pick these variations up at $999 and $1,099 during sales on average, though during this event, you’re getting an opportunity to score them at their best tracked rates. All the items are in brand-new condition and are likely to sell out quickly, so be sure to snag them while the prices are hot. We’ve highlighted some of the must have deals below for you to check out, so hit the jump and get all the details.
